verses.roman:
ye tomāra icchā, āmi seita kariba
yāhāṅ lañā yāha tumi, tāhāṅi yāiba"

synonyms: ye tomāra icchā—whatever You like; āmi—I; seita kariba—must act accordingly; yāhāṅ—wherever; lañā yāha—take; tumi—you; tāhāṅi yāiba—I shall go there.
translation: "Whatever you desire, I must do. Wherever you take Me, I shall go."
